coreAttributes.name: guqin
coreAttributes.description: An arcane weapon in the form of a traditional Chinese harp, infused with demonstone to act as an arcane catalyst. A potent tool for inflaming passions, or calming a troubled mind.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Play a note at [npc2.name] with your guqin.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] guqin to float in the air before [npc.she], so that [npc.she] may play it at a moment's notice.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] wraps [npc.her] guqin carefully in its carry bag, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] strums [npc.her] guqin at [npc2.name], grinning as the wave of arcane-infused sound hits [npc2.her] body!
Plucking a note at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] guqin, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the arcane-infused sound travels straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] plays a note at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] guqin, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the arcane-infused sound passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] strums [npc.her] guqin at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Playing at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] guqin, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] plucks a note at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] guqin, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
